title: Happy Birthday Prince, Kate Spade, Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update, Whitney Houston, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Happy Birthday Prince, Kate Spade, Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update, Whitney Houston, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The Purple One would have celebrated his 60th birthday today. The Kate Spade suicide leaves many questions and Uncle Steve shines light on the situation. Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis are legendary producers and they remember Prince and what he taught them. Sheryl Underwood talks about current events and has a suggestion that leads to China. Carla's Reality Update reminds us of Celebrity Family Feud and she also talks about Love and Hip Hop Atlanta. Whitney Houston has a Bible that is selling for $95,000. The CEO has his fondest memories of The Purple One in his Closing Remarks and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
